step.title: Importing members
step.query: id_member, member_name, date_registered, posts, id_group, lngfile, last_login, real_name, unread_messages, new_pm, buddy_list, pm_ignore_list, pm_prefs, mod_prefs, message_labels, passwd, email_address, personal_text, gender, birthdate, website_url, website_title, location, hide_email, show_online, time_format, signature, time_offset, avatar, pm_email_notify, usertitle, notify_announcements, notify_regularity, notify_send_body, notify_types, member_ip, member_ip2, secret_question, secret_answer, id_theme, is_activated, validation_code, id_msg_last_visit, additional_groups, smiley_set, id_post_group, total_time_logged_in, password_salt, ignore_boards, warning, passwd_flood, pm_receive_from

step.title: Importing attachments
step.query: id_attach, id_thumb, id_msg, id_member, attachment_type, filename, file_hash, size, downloads, width, height, fileext, mime_type, id_folder

step.title: Importing boards
step.query: id_board, id_cat, child_level, id_parent, board_order, id_last_msg, id_msg_updated, member_groups, id_profile, name, description, num_topics, num_posts, count_posts, id_theme, override_theme, unapproved_posts, unapproved_topics, redirect

step.title: Importing topics
step.query: id_topic, is_sticky, id_board, id_first_msg, id_last_msg, id_member_started, id_member_updated, id_poll, id_previous_board, id_previous_topic, num_replies, num_views, locked, unapproved_posts, approved

step.title: Importing messages
step.query: id_msg, id_topic, id_board, poster_time, id_member, id_msg_modified, subject, poster_name, poster_email, poster_ip, smileys_enabled, modified_time, modified_name, body, icon, approved

step.title: Importing polls
step.query: id_poll, question, voting_locked, max_votes, expire_time, hide_results, change_vote, guest_vote, num_guest_voters, reset_poll, id_member, poster_name

step.title: Importing personal messages
step.query: id_pm, id_pm_head, id_member_from, deleted_by_sender, from_name, msgtime, subject, bodyk

step.title: Importing pm recipients
step.query: id_pm, id_member, labels, bcc, is_read, is_new, deleted

step.title: Importing pm rules
step.query: id_rule, id_member, rule_name, criteria, actions, delete_pm, is_or

step.title: Importing membergroups
step.query: id_group, group_name, description, online_color, min_posts, max_messages, icons, group_type, hidden, id_parent

step.title: Importing smileys
step.query: id_smiley, code, filename, description, smiley_row, smiley_order, hidden

step.title: Importing statistics (activity log)
step.query: date, hits, topics, posts, registers, most_on

step.title: Importing logged actions
step.query: id_action, id_log, log_time, id_member, ip, action, id_board, id_topic, id_msg, extra

step.title: Importing reported posts
step.query: id_report, id_msg, id_topic, id_board, id_member, membername, subject, body, time_started, time_updated, num_reports, closed, ignore_all

step.title: Importing reported comments
step.query: id_comment, id_report, id_member, membername, comment, time_sent

step.title: Importing subscriptions
step.query: id_subscribe, name, description, cost, length, id_group, add_groups, active, repeatable, allow_partial, reminder, email_complete

step.title: Importing custom fields
step.query: id_field, col_name, field_name, field_desc, field_type, field_length, field_options, mask, show_reg, show_display, show_profile, private, active, bbc, can_search, default_value, enclose, placement
